item.title: Just the Tech Jobs, Please
item.description:
Feeling anxious about your job security in this uncertain economy? Or maybe you’re an employer searching for the perfect candidate for a specific tech role. In either scenario, you need a platform that cuts through the noise of generic job boards. JustTechJobs is your solution - a specialized job portal dedicated exclusively to tech positions. Upon visiting JustTechJobs, you’ll instantly notice a list of freshly posted tech jobs. The site showcases a diverse range of positions from across the United States, updated daily...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/just-the-tech-jobs-please/

item.title: Tech Jobs Come Calling
item.description:
Although the Great Recession continues, the impact varies across industries. In fact, the technology sector is performing quite well in terms of employment. From November to December of last year, while 85,000 jobs were lost overall, the tech industry actually added 5,200 new positions. This suggests that technology might be a promising field. However, having technological skills doesn’t guarantee employment. Many factory workers, for instance, would likely agree. The manufacturing sector was already moving overseas even before the recession...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/tech-jobs-come-calling/
